com.gmarciani.gmparser.models.parser.lr.recognition

Class BigProductionGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmarciani.gmparser.models.automaton.AbstractAutomaton<V>
      • com.gmarciani.gmparser.models.automaton.TransitionGraph<Item>
        • com.gmarciani.gmparser.models.parser.lr.recognition.BigProductionGraph

  • public class BigProductionGraph
extends TransitionGraph<Item>

    Big Productions Graph model.

    A Big Production Graph is a transition graph whose states contains sets of items.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Giacomo Marciani
    See Also:
    TransitionGraph, Item, LROneMatrix, LROneParser
